These names for males and females originated from Welsh, Irish, German, English, Persian, Spanish, Greek, American, Biblical, African, Slavic, Polish and Indian background. - AGNES: Greek female name meaning Pure. - BRONWEN: Welsh female name meaning Dark, Pure.
